class main.ProbabilityDensityFunction(x, y)¶

Class describing pdfs. :param x: array of x values to be passed to the pdf :type x: array :param y: array of y values to be passed to the pdf :type y: array

probability(x1, x2)¶

Returns the probability for a random variabile to be included between x1 and x2. :param x1: one bound for the integration :type x1: float :param x2: the other bound for the integration :type x2: float :return: probability bewteen x1 and x2 :rtype: float

rnd(size=1000)¶

Returns an array of random values from the pdf. :param size: number of values to be extracted, defaults to 1000 :type size: int, optional :return: array of values distributed according to the pdf :rtype: array
